messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] It's Good To Be Back
messages.msgSnippet: -=-I can t remember when the unschooling.com site stopped it s message boards - was it 2 or so years ago? Anyway, I used to visit that site every day!-=-
messages.messageBody:
-=-I can't remember when the unschooling.com site stopped it's message
boards - was it 2 or so years ago? Anyway, I used to visit that site
every day!-=-

Longer, I think. It's a bummer.

There's another message board here:
http://unschooling.info/forum/

and there are a couple of lists on which I'm active--this one and
UnschoolingDiscussion which is described and linked here:
http://sandradodd.com/unschoolingdiscussion

For you doubts, try Joyce's really well-organized collection
http://joyfullyrejoycing.com/
or putter around my ever-growing site
http://sandradodd.com/unschooling
or search here:
http://sandradodd.com/search


I hope you have some fun on this list, too. The archives are "new-
improved" and easily searchable. You might want to try that too,
just go to the main page of this list or click the messages link at
the bottom of an e-mail and there's a search function right there.
That's pretty cool.

Sandra

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: It's Good To Be Back
messages.msgSnippet: I can t remember when the unschooling.com site stopped it s message boards - was it 2 or so years ago?  Anyway, I used to visit that site every day!  Maybe
messages.messageBody:
I can't remember when the unschooling.com site stopped it's message
boards - was it 2 or so years ago? Anyway, I used to visit that site
every day! Maybe some of you remember, maybe not, but no matter - I've
found another great group!
I've got some memberships in other unschooling/homeschooling yahoo
groups but none that I actively participate in, though it was one of
those groups that mentioned the AlwaysLearning group, so I checked it
out.
I saw the name Sandra Dodd and that was it for me and here I am!
My ds Aaron is now 12 and my dd Amber is 8, we still unschool and I
still experience worries and doubts. I won't elaborate on those yet, I
just wanted to say "HI!"
